name: Grandad Gladiator
description:
It is the year 2040, and the population of Earth is getting out of control due to advances in medicine. To cull the population, they teleport the aging populations back in time to "dispose of them".

Survive in this arena-style combat game, where you must use your wheelchair to dodge enemies, and take out the final fighter. 

Use your spear to aim at the enemy, take them out to gain gold, and upgrade your wheel chair at the local smith.

The aim of the game is to upgrade your wheelchair to the point the game is trivial, while trying to live against the hordes of ever increasing enemies. As the game goes on, the harder the enemies get.

Controls:

WASD (or controller sticks)

Right Click to aim spear.

Tips:

Don't run into enemy weapons, they have a wide swing, use your range.

Be careful about standing still as the longer you stay still, the more enemies will target you and go for you.

This game is currently a Prototype to engage interest in the game. Some art assets are to be updated at a later stage and are currently placeholders. The game was created over 3 weeks, used as a prototype to collect data on what players who play the game do inside of the game, and for analytical purposes.
